Billing.title: Billing & Bank Details
Billing.description: Provide your payout details so admins know where to send your earnings.
Billing.payout-summary-description: Amount currently owed to you from online or card payments.
Billing.instructions-description: Keep these details up to date to avoid payout delays.
Billing.instructions-1: Enter the exact information that appears on your bank statements.
Billing.instructions-2: Update the details whenever you switch accounts or banks.
Billing.instructions-3: Admins can only transfer payouts after receiving accurate bank data.
Billing.form-description: Only admins can see this information. It is stored securely.
Billing.notes-placeholder: Routing notes, branch codes, or payout instructions
Billing.save-error: Failed to save bank details. Please try again.
Billing.load-error: Unable to load billing information. Please refresh and try again.

Fleet.select-vehicle-from-admin-fleet: Select a vehicle from the admin's fleet to request assignment

Fleet.you-can-request-different-vehicle: You can request a different vehicle.
Fleet.select-vehicle-to-request: Select a vehicle to request assignment
Fleet.ensure-logged-in-and-refresh: Please make sure you are logged in as a partner and try refreshing the page.
Fleet.confirm-cancel-request: Are you sure you want to cancel this fleet request?
Fleet.confirm-remove-fleet: Are you sure you want to remove this fleet assignment? You won't be able to accept rides until you request and get approved for a new fleet.
Fleet.check-back-later: Check back later for available vehicles
Fleet.confirm-fleet-change-message: Are you sure you want to request a different fleet? Your current fleet assignment will be changed to pending status and you won't be able to accept rides until the admin approves your new request.
Fleet.already-requested-this-vehicle: You have already requested this vehicle. Please wait for admin approval.

Partners.provide-fleet-rejection-reason: Please provide a reason for rejecting this fleet request

Partners.confirm-delete-fleet-request: Are you sure you want to delete this rejected fleet request? This action cannot be undone.

Features.enable-or-disable-specific-modules: Enable or disable specific modules in your application
Features.enable-partner-registration: Enable partner registration, document verification, and ride assignments. When disabled, the Partners menu will be hidden from the admin sidebar.
Features.enable-the-legacy-drivers-system: Enable the legacy drivers system for backward compatibility. When disabled, the Drivers menu will be hidden from the admin sidebar.
Features.note-changes-to-module-settings: Note: Changes to module settings take effect after saving and refreshing the page. Disabling a module hides it from navigation but does not delete existing data.
